conclusion: Analyze the paths of the liquids from points A, B, and C to determine which container (D or E) the liquid will flow into.
The liquid flows from A through the light blue pipe.
The liquid from A continues through the orange pipe.
The orange pipe leads directly to the right side of the baffle system.
The liquid from A will flow into container E.
The liquid flows from B through the black pipe.
The liquid from B continues through the red pipe.
The red pipe leads directly to the right side of the baffle system.
The liquid from B will flow into container E.
The liquid flows from C through the green pipe.
The liquid from C continues through the yellow pipe.
The yellow pipe leads directly to the right side of the baffle system.
The liquid from C will flow into container E.
All the liquids from points A, B, and C will flow into container E after passing through the baffles.
The liquid will flow into container E.
